text: Al-Kholood Club (Arabic: ) is a Saudi Arabian professional football club based in Ar Rass, It was founded on 1970. It currently plays in Saudi Professional League. It is plays home match at Al-Hazem Club Stadium. == History == On 2024, Al-Kholood promoted to Saudi Professional League. == Players == === Out on loan === == References == == Other websites == * Category:Saudi Arabian football clubs Category:1970 establishments in Asia
title: Al-Kholood Club
